title: Break Down Conventions!
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Shioriko-san, how are the Nijigaku members doing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Some aren’t doing very well.... How about Aqours members?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It’s the same over here. I’m hoping that they’ll be able to get their grades back up on this semester’s tests, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That’s right. I wonder what we can do to have them recover....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Shioriko-san, let’s both think of a way to make them like studying. We can’t just keep being strict with them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Do you have a plan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, lend me your ears for a little bit.... *whisper whisper*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeeh!? T-, that’s.... a good idea!! I’ve never thought of that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu.... Progress is questioning conventions and breaking them.... Or so, a famous person once said<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>It was eye-opening!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
